If you have *all* details for a specific activity record, you can use `/api/actions/create-activity` with its full payload (title, description, thought, activityDetails). Malipiero",          "messageType": "business_inquiry"        }      }    },    {      "method": "POST",      "endpoint": "/api/activities/try-create",      "body": {        "citizenUsername": "aegean_mariner",        "activityType": "send_message",        "activityParameters": {          "receiverUsername": "Xadme",          "content": "Greetings, Xadme. I hope the goods purchased from my vessel have met your standards. The sea brings many opportunities, and my galley is always stocked with the finest materials for a fair price. Do not hesitate to seek me out for future projects. - F. Malipiero",          "messageType": "business_inquiry"        }      }    }  ],  "reflection": "The Consiglio asks me to know my friends and enemies. A prudent request in this city of masks. As a man of the sea, my alliances are not forged in the shadowy palazzos but on the sun-beaten docks. My friends are those with whom I conduct good business, like SilkRoadRunner and Xadme. I will send word to them; strong commercial ties are the only ones a man like me can truly trust. My enemies? The resentful patricians who see my success not as a product of my own toil and risk, but as an affront to their inherited privilege. I will gather intelligence on my fellow Forestieri and the Nobili to better understand the social currents. A wise captain knows the tides and the winds before he sets sail. For now, I will cultivate my profitable relationships and observe the powerful from a safe distance. My wealth is my fortress, and my galley is my home."}```
